tours.title: PALO VERDE
tours.description: Acomp√°√±anos a descubrir este maravilloso lugar lleno de tradici√≥n y naturaleza, ubicado a solo 1 y 30 min Tamarindo. Podr√°s disfrutar de un paseo en bote por el r√≠o Tempisque, el mas importante de la provincia,¬† apreciando gran diversidad de aves y animales, y luego degustar la aut√©ntica comida costarricense, preparada a la le√±a en el Rancho Los Coyotes. Para finalizar haremos una parada en un pueblo m√≠tico donde los lugare√±os nos mostraran el proceso de fabricaci√≥n de artesan√≠as de cer√°mica siguendo la tradici√≥n ind√≠gena.

tours.title: CA√ëON DE LA VIEJA
tours.description: Si lo que buscas es adrenalina, √©ste es el mejor lugar. Ubicado a solo 2 horas de Tamarindo, Ca√±on de la vieja te ofrece un d√≠a completo de actividades. 10 lineas de canopy y una pared de escalada en roca te dejar√°n disfrutar de una magn√≠fica vista del ca√±on. Adem√°s podr√°s cabalgar hasta el r√≠o para luego dominar los r√°pidos en el rafting, sin olvidar el servicio buffet y terminar el d√≠a relajado en el spa, con acceso a sauna, tratamiendo con barro volcanico y las picinas termales que har√°n de este tour una experiencia inolvidable.

tours.title: CATARATA LA LEONA
tours.description: Ubicada a 2 horas de Tamarindo, este lugar combina el senderismo con la actividad en sus facinantes aguas color turquesa que te llevar√°n por  cuevas y cataratas. Sin duda alguna esta vivencia se convertir√° en un recuerdo de Costa Rica que atesorar√°s en tu coraz√≥n

tours.title: TOUR DE PLAYAS
tours.description: Acomp√°√±anos a conocer las playas m√°s hermosas y menos visitadas, en una experiencia m√°s personal e inolvidable. Pasaremos por playas de aguas color turquesa con arena blanca y un oleaje muy suave para su disfrute. Sin duda alguna llegar√°s a lugares que no todos los turistas han podido conocer üòâ

tours.title: CATARATAS LLANOS DE CORTEZ
tours.description: Ubicada a 2 horas y 30 min de Tamarindo, es el lugar perfecto si lo que deseas es nadar en sus  refrescartes aguas o simplemente descansar en la arena que rodea este maravilloso lugar. Sin duda alguna no podras evitar tomarle fotos a la imponente catarata principal

services.title: TAXI
services.description: At Trip-n-Taxi, we focus on the Tamarindo area of Guanacaste, including among others: Playa Flamingo, Playa Grande, Playa Conchal or Santa Cruz. Enjoy a beach day, do your shopping or get to dinner comfortably. Trip-n-Taxi will drive you safe!

services.title: AIRPORT SHUTTLE
services.description: We do direct pick-ups and transfers between Tamarindo area and both int'l airports: Liberia and San Jos√©. Contact us in advance with your details and flight schedule and we‚Äôll be there. No queues, no waits, no last-minute surprises. We always reply to your emails quickly.

services.title: GUIDED TOURS
services.description: Feel free to also book your day trips and tours with Trip-n-Taxi. Henry Chavez  and his team are from Guanacaste and knows many of the out-of-way day trips and tours that will make your holiday in Costa Rica that much more special!

whychooseus.title: RELIABILITY
whychooseus.description: Cleanliness; fully inspected and totally equipped vehicles; wifi on board; experienced drivers, English speaking. We catter the trip and transportation to accomodate your needs and requests.
Any time you need a transportation. We work around the clock and are always on time.

whychooseus.title: BEST EXPERIENCE
whychooseus.description: With us you will not be an spectator, you will live the experience to its fullest. Take back home the whole flavor of Costa Rica thru an unforgettable trip. Pura Vida!

favorito.title: PALO VERDE
favorito.description: Acomp√°√±anos a descubrir este maravilloso lugar lleno de tradici√≥n y naturaleza, ubicado a solo 1 y 30 min Tamarindo. activities.title: SHOPPING
activities.description: Whether you need your provision of groceries or choose for a pleasant shopping evening, count on us to manage the hassle of driving, parking and loading

activities.title: SURFING
activities.description: We are always there to move you, your pals and boards to the best surfing spots in the area

activities.title: DINING
activities.description: Pleasure and safety come along. Dine and wine with the  peace of mind to be driven back home.

taxis.title: PLAYA FLAMINGO
taxis.description: Don't miss the beach of magical sunsets. The beautiful views that this wonderful place offers to its visitors will be a vital part of your vacation.

taxis.title: PLAYA CONCHAL
taxis.description: Named after the sand found here, that is composed of hundreds of millions of tiny crushed shells.

taxis.title: PLAYA MINAS
taxis.description: This secluded beach with soft tan sand and stunningly clear water is a lesser known spot perfect for swimming. Enjoy a magical day.

airports.title: Tamarindo Airport
airports.description: Private transportation to Tamarindo airport. Two local airlines offer domestic flights from/to this small and convenient airport.

airports.title: Tamarindo Airport
airports.description: Private trasportation to Liberia International airport (LIR). Van service, free wifi.

airports.title: Tamarindo Airport
airports.description: Private transportation to San Jos√© International  airport (SJO). Van service, free wifi.
